LanguageData.Smithing.label: Melee I
LanguageData.Smithing.description: A lil' of the ol' chop-chop
LanguageData.LongBlades.label: Melee II
LanguageData.LongBlades.description: Get me something big and sharp
LanguageData.Melee_C1.label: Melee III
LanguageData.Melee_C1.description: Guns for show, knives for a pro.
LanguageData.Melee_C2.label: Melee IV
LanguageData.Melee_C2.description: Stun settings are for people who can't commit
LanguageData.Melee_D1.label: Melee V
LanguageData.Melee_D1.description: One, two! One, two! And through, and through. The charged blade went snicker-snack!
LanguageData.Melee_E1.label: Psychological weapon
LanguageData.Melee_E1.description: Is it a melee if it has "lance" in a name?
LanguageData.Bow_A1.label: Bows I
LanguageData.RecurveBow.label: Bows II
LanguageData.Greatbow.label: Crossbows I
LanguageData.Greatbow.description: Not as good as real gun, but silent and cheap
LanguageData.Bow_B2.label: Crossbows II
LanguageData.Machining.label: Guns I
LanguageData.Machining.description: Good gun is a bad gun, if it dont have ammo
LanguageData.Gunsmithing.label: Pistols I
LanguageData.Pistols_C2.label: Pistols II
LanguageData.GasOperation.label: Shotgun I
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.label: SMG I
LanguageData.SMG_C2.label: SMG II
LanguageData.SMG_C2.description: Be like Big Al, but a bit better
LanguageData.Rifles_C1.label: Rifles I
LanguageData.Rifles_C1.description: Some people say you can use blood of your enemies as weapon oil with this guns
LanguageData.Sniper_rifles_C1.label: Sniper rifles I
LanguageData.Grenade_C1.label: Grenades I
LanguageData.Grenade_C1.description: Let it go, let it go Can't hold it back anymore
LanguageData.Grenade_C2.label: Grenades II
LanguageData.Grenade_C2.description: O Lord, bless this Thy hand grenade, that with it Thou mayest blow Thine enemies to tiny bits, in Thy mercy.
LanguageData.IED_C1.label: IED I
LanguageData.Range_C2.label: Guns II
LanguageData.Shotgun_C2.label: Shotgun II
LanguageData.Shotgun_C2.description: Heavy is good, heavy is reliable. If it doesn't work, you can always hit them with it.
LanguageData.Rifles_C2.label: Rifles II
LanguageData.Rifles_C3.label: Rifles III
LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.label: Sniper rifles II
LanguageData.HeavyTurrets.label: Heavy weapons I
LanguageData.HeavyTurrets.description: Some people think they can outsmart me
LanguageData.MultibarrelWeapons.label: Heavy weapons II
LanguageData.MultibarrelWeapons.description: I've yet to meet one that can outsmart bullet
LanguageData.Heavy_C3.label: Heavy weapons III
LanguageData.Heavy_C3.description: It costs four hundred thousand dollars to fire this weapon...for twelve seconds.
LanguageData.Grenade_launchers_C1.label: Grenade launchers I
LanguageData.Grenade_launchers_C1.description: What makes me a good Demoman?
LanguageData.Grenade_launchers_C2.label: Grenade launchers II
LanguageData.Grenade_launchers_C2.description: If I were a bad Demoman, I wouldn't be sittin' here, discussin' it with you now would I?
LanguageData.Rockets_C1.label: Rockets I
LanguageData.Rockets_C1.description: If fighting is sure to result in victory, then you must fight!
LanguageData.Sniper_rifles_D1.label: Sniper rifles III
LanguageData.ChargedShot.label: Directed-energy weapon
LanguageData.ChargedShot.description: Phased plasma rifle in the 40-watt range
LanguageData.Laser_weapons_D.label: Laser weapons I
LanguageData.Plasma_weapons_D.label: Plasma weapons I
LanguageData.Charge_weapons_D.label: Charge weapons I
LanguageData.Laser_weapons_E.label: Laser weapons II
LanguageData.Laser_weapons_E.description: Being a device that flouts conventional scientific consensus that the molecules composing the human body must be arranged 'just so', and not, for example, across a square-mile radius
LanguageData.Plasma_weapons_E.label: Plasma weapons II
LanguageData.Plasma_weapons_E.description: Powerful weapon that produces an intense, energetic beam of heat in the tens of thousands of degrees centigrade
LanguageData.Charge_weapons_E.label: Charge weapons II
LanguageData.Ballista_B1.label: Siege weapons
LanguageData.Turrets_31.label: Turrets I
LanguageData.Turrets_31.description: How am I going to stop some big mean mother hubbard from tearing me a structurally superfluous new behind?
LanguageData.SniperTurret.label: Heavy turrets I
LanguageData.Heavy_turrets_C2.label: Heavy turrets II
LanguageData.Heavy_turrets_C3.label: Heavy turrets III
LanguageData.Heavy_turrets_C3.description: One crossed wire, one wayward pinch of potassium chlorate, one errant twitch...
LanguageData.Mortars.label: Artillery I
LanguageData.Artillery_C2.label: Artillery II
LanguageData.GunTurrets.label: Autoturrets I
LanguageData.Autoturrets_D2.label: Autoturrets II
LanguageData.Autoturrets_D3.label: Autoturrets III
LanguageData.Autoturrets_D3.description: I told ya don't touch that darn thing
LanguageData.Autoturrets_E1.label: Autoturrets IV
LanguageData.Autoturrets_E1.description: We've got lightning guns. We can do anything.
LanguageData.Rockets_C2.label: Rockets II
LanguageData.Rockets_C2.description: Sun Tzu said that, and I'd say he knows a little more about fighting than you do, pal, because he invented it!
LanguageData.Rockets_D1.label: Rockets III
LanguageData.Rockets_D1.description: And then he perfected it so that no living man could best him in the ring of honor!
LanguageData.Rockets_D2.label: Rockets IV
